'''Maria''' is the gym employee in "[[The One With The Ballroom Dancing]]", portrayed by [[Amber Smith]].

Maria is brought out any time someone wants to quit the gym or refuses to join, the most prominent examples being [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]] and [[Ross Geller|Ross]]. 

[[File:Friends. How to quit a gym membership.|thumb|center|335 px]]
